profileAlternative.name: A Abdul
profileAlternative.headline: Python Developer at Cadence
profileAlternative.summary:
• Over 7 years of experience as a Web Application Developer and Software Engineer using Python, Django, C++, Javascript, Java .
• Good Experience with Django, a high-level Python Web framework.
• Experience object oriented programming (OOP) concepts using Python and Django.
• Experienced in LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL, and Python/PHP) Architecture.
• Experienced in developing web-based applications using Python, Django, PHP, C++, XML, CSS, HTML5/CSS3,AngularJS, DHTML, JavaScript and JQuery.
• Good experience with Amazon Cloud EC2, Elastic Bean and Simple Storage Service S3 .

positions.title: Python Developer
positions.description:
• Worked with stakeholders/Business Analyst to understand system requirements and created Detail Design specs.
• Technical experience with LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PYTHON) architecture.
• Developed entire frontend and backend modules using Python on Django Web Framework.
• Designed and developed data management system using MySQL and Django.
• Developed responsive UI using HTML5/CSS3,AngularJS and Javascript.
• Developed database layer including Tables and Stored procedures in MYSQL.
• Ported parts of application on cloud using AWS.
• Used Amazon Cloud EC2 ,Amazon S3 and Elastic bean to deploy the project on Cloud
